meanings.definition: Plants of a particular region or period
meanings.sent1: The diverse flora in the forest includes tall trees and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the flora of the desert to understand its unique ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid nuts among the flora, thinking they were well-hidden.
meanings.sent4: The flora of the garden danced in the wind, creating a beautiful natural symphony.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the vibrant colors of the flora painted the landscape in hues of green and red.

meanings.definition: The plant life characteristic of a particular area, period, or environment
meanings.sent1: The tropical flora in the rainforest thrives in the humid climate.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins are surrounded by the lush flora of a bygone era.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey swung from branch to branch, disturbing the peaceful flora.
meanings.sent4: The flora of the meadow whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant flora of the botanical garden attracted visitors from far and wide.
